column2: Australia, Canada and South Africa have been independent for too long, it's time for them to be under our direct control.
Mobilize the troops and educate the masses!
Korea should recognize the legitimacy of the Emperor Meiji and it's place under the Land of the Rising Sun!
We have blurred the borders and conquered the vast expanse of South America, and now it's time to unite the people!
Establish a Supply Depot in our capital
